core.descr: This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the mode showing whether at port level security is enabled or not
This variable signifies the limit of dynamically locked MAC addresses allowed on a specific port.
This variable signifies the limit of statically locked MAC addresses allowed on a specific port.
This variable is used to enable or disable the sending of new violation traps designating when a packet with a disallowed MAC address is received on a locked port.
This object specifies the Frequency interval between successive SNMP traps.
This variable displays the vlan-id and source MAC address of the last packet that was discarded on a locked port.
This variable displays the vlan-id and source MAC address of the last packet that was discarded on a locked port.

This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id and MAC address to be added to the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port. The VLAN id and MAC address combination would be entered in a particular fashion like :- 2 a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1(the vlan-id and MAC addr

This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id and MAC address to be added to the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port. The VLAN id and MAC address combination would be entered in a particular fashion like :- 2 a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1(the vlan-id and MAC addr

This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id and MAC address to be removed from the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port.. The VLAN id and MAC address combination would be entered in a particular fashion like :- 2 a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1(the vlan-id and MAC
This object specifies the mode showing whether at the global level, port security is enabled or not
This instance specifies Port MAC Locking maximum dynamic limit for the specified interface
This instance specifies Port MAC Locking current Dynamic entries used count for the specified interface
This instance specifies Port MAC Locking current static entries used count for the specified interface
This instance specifies Port MAC Locking maximum static limit for the specified interface
The Port MAC Locking check static limit for the specified interface
This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the source MAC address of the packet that is received on the dynamically locked port.
This object specifies the source VLAN id of the packet that is received on the dynamically locked port.
This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the source MAC address of the packet that is received on the statically locked port.
This object specifies the source VLAN id of the packet that is received on the statically locked port.

This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id and MAC address to be added to the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port. The VLAN id and MAC address combination would be entered in a particular fashion like :- 2 a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1(the vlan-id and MAC addr
This object displays the Static MAC Address configured on the selected interface.
This object displays the Dynamic MAC Addresses learnt on the selected interface.
This object deletes a statically locked entry from an interface.
This object deletes a statically locked entry from an interface.

ui.name: Port Security Static MAC Entry Delete

core.descr: This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the interface to be configured for PortSecurity
This object specifies the action of either add/remove/none
This MIB variable accepts MAC address to be added to the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port. and MAC address would be entered in a particular fashion like a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1
This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id to be added to the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port.
